name: Chef (SmokyChambers)
description: From the mind of my eight-year-old comes a short story of a local witch that has turned everyone into zombies. It's up to a girl, that goes by the name of Chef, and her ex-boyfriend, Kyle, to save their village.  A short story about love, witchcraft, and zombies, this pixelated game will have you wondering, why a cupcake?
